    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceSettingsManager

        public DeviceSettingsManager()
        Instantiates a new Device settings manager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setNetworkLocationDisabled

        public boolean setNetworkLocationDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                          boolean disable)
        Disable or restore network location capacity of device. CAUTION: Restore operation will NOT change current set.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means disable network location capacity, false restore to normal status.
        返回:
        true means operation successful, false means failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isNetworkLocationDisabled

        public boolean isNetworkLocationDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not device capacity of network location is forbidden.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means network location capacity is forbidden.

      • setUnknownSourceAppInstallDisabled

        public boolean setUnknownSourceAppInstallDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                  boolean disable)
        Disable or restore unknown source app install setting. CAUTION: Restore operation will NOT change current set.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means disable unknown source app install setting and user cannot open it false means restore operation, user can change this setting.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isUnknownSourceAppInstallDisabled

        public boolean isUnknownSourceAppInstallDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not forbidden policy unknown source app install is active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active. false means policy is not active.

      • setAllTetheringDisabled

        public boolean setAllTetheringDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       boolean disable)
        Disable or restore all tethering (include WIFI tethering, Bluetooth tethering, USB tethering) function. CAUTION: Restore operation will NOT change current set value.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means to active policy. false means to deactive policy.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isAllTetheringDisabled

        public boolean isAllTetheringDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not all tethering forbidden policy active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active. false means policy is not active.

      • setWIFIeditDisabled

        public boolean setWIFIeditDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   boolean disable)
        Disable or restore WIFI AP edit operation policy.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means to active policy. false means to deactive policy.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

                                         boolean disable)

        参数:

        disable - true means to active policy. false means to deactive policy.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isRestoreFactoryDisabled

        public boolean isRestoreFactoryDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not restore device operation policy active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active. false means policy is not active.

      • setWIFIStandbyMode

        public boolean setWIFIStandbyMode(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                  int status)
        Set WIFI standby mode when device is in sleep mode policy.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        status - Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER : Active the policy and set system wifi standby mode to WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER_WHILE_PLUGGED : Active the policy and set system wifi standby mode to WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER_WHILE_PLUGGED Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_DEFAULT : Active the policy and set system wifi standby mode to WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_DEFAULT -1 : Inactive the policy and NOT modify current system wifi standby mode Other value is invalid.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • getWIFIStandbyMode

        public int getWIFIStandbyMode(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the current system wifi standby POLICY mode value.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER : Means policy is active and system wifi standby mode is WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER_WHILE_PLUGGED : Means policy is active and system wifi standby mode is WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_NEVER_WHILE_PLUGGED Settings.Global.WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_DEFAULT : Means policy is active and system wifi standby mode is WIFI_SLEEP_POLICY_DEFAULT -1 : Means policy is inactive

      • setBluetoothTetheringDisabled

        public boolean setBluetoothTetheringDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                             boolean disable)
        Disable or restore bluetooth tethering operation policy.
        参数:

      • setFontSize

        public boolean setFontSize(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                           int size)
        set system font size .
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        size - value 1 (FONT_SIZE_SMALL) - SMALL value 2 (FONT_SIZE_NORMAL) - NORMAL value 3 (FONT_SIZE_LARGE) - LARGE value 4 (FONT_SIZE_HUGE ) - HUGE value 5 (FONT_SIZE_EXTRA_HUGE) - EXTRA_HUGE value -1 (FONT_MDM_POLICY_REMOVED) - remove policy
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isUnlockByFingerprintDisabled

        public boolean isUnlockByFingerprintDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get whether or not unlock device by fingerprint operation policy is active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active,user unable to unlock device by fingerprint. false means policy is not active,user can unlock device by fingerprint.

      • isRestrictBackgroundProcessDisabled

        public boolean isRestrictBackgroundProcessDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the policy of background process restriction is active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active. false means policy is not active.

      • setDevelopmentOptionDisabled

        public boolean setDevelopmentOptionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                            boolean disable)
        Disable or restore development option and restore operation policy.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means to active policy. false means to deactive policy.
        返回:
        true means operation successful. false means operation failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SETTINGS_RESTRICTION} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isDevelopmentOptionDisabled

        public boolean isDevelopmentOptionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not development option and restore operation policy is active.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means policy is active. false means policy is not active.

                                          boolean disable)

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllowAccessibilityServicesList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
